meanings.sent1: The empty soda can was crushable under my foot.
meanings.sent2: The cardboard box was crushable, so I folded it easily.
meanings.sent3: I tried to hug my crushable pillow, but it kept slipping away.
meanings.sent4: Her crushable dreams were shattered when she didn't get the job.
meanings.sent5: The delicate flower petals were crushable with a gentle touch.

meanings.definition: Able to be easily flattened or destroyed.
meanings.sent1: The crushable paper cup crumpled in my hand.
meanings.sent2: The fragile toy was crushable, so I handled it carefully.
meanings.sent3: The crushable cookie broke into pieces when I dropped it.
meanings.sent4: His crushable sandcastle was washed away by the tide.
meanings.sent5: The crushable cardboard box collapsed under the weight of the books.
